name: EuropeanIssuers
legal: aisbl-ivzw (association internationale sans but lucratif) under belgian law
membership: EuropeanIssuers does not belong to any association / federation / confederation or any other type of network. Various national associations representing companies are our members (see the list on our website).
goal: EuropeanIssuers is a pan-European organisation representing the interests of publicly quoted companies across Europe to the EU Institutions. Our members include both national associations and companies from all sectors in 15 European countries, covering markets worth € 7.6 trillion market capitalisation with approximately 8000 companies. We aim to ensure that EU policy creates an environment in which companies can raise capital through the public markets and can deliver growth over the longer-term. We seek capital markets that serve the interests of their end users, including issuers.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation
euInitiatives:
• Capital Markets Union
• Corporate Governance & Company Law
• Listing Requirements
• Corporate Reporting
• Securities Law
• Investment Chain and Markets’ Infrastructure
• Financial Transaction Tax
• Public Country-by-Country Reporting
